item.title: Report E-2025010327
item.description:
Report E-2025010327

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-31T00:56:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-23
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On January 23, 2025, one (1) 55-gallon drum of Lindride 22 was damaged by a forklift and released approximately fifteen (15) gallons of product to the trailer floor. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from GrayMar Environmental Servies (GES) to remediate the site. The crew utilized absorbents and hand tools to containerize all spent material in one (1) 55-gallon drum. The crew placed the damaged drum in one (1) 85-gallon overpack for disposal.
